ability.ability_dark_passage.name: Dark Passage
ability.ability_dark_passage.desc: Allows you to use Dark Corridors without being apart of the Organization.
ability.ability_rage_awakened.name: Rage Awakened
ability.ability_rage_awakened.desc: Allows you to give into your rage and let your heart blacken with anger -- let it empower you!
ability.ability_darkness_boost.name: Darkness Boost
ability.ability_darkness_boost.desc: Increases damage done with dark-based attacks.
ability.ability_dark_power.name: Dark Power
ability.ability_dark_power.desc: Allows you to embrace the power of Darkness and access Dark Form.
ability.ability_way_to_light.name: Way to Light
ability.ability_way_to_light.desc: Allows you to embrace the power of Light and access Light Form.
ability.ability_light_boost.name: Light Boost
ability.ability_light_boost.desc: Increases damage done with light-based attacks.
ability.ability_adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
ability.ability_adrenaline.desc: Increases your strength stat when you're low on HP.
ability.ability_critical_surge.name: Critical Surge
ability.ability_critical_surge.desc: Increases your magic stat when you're low on HP.
ability.ability_light_step_0.name: Light Step LV.1
ability.ability_light_step_1.name: Light Step LV.2
ability.ability_light_step_2.name: Light Step LV.3
ability.ability_light_step_3.name: Light Step MAX
ability.ability_light_step.desc: Engulf yourself in Light and dash with the Action Button while sprinting!
ability.ability_dark_step_0.name: Dark Step LV.1
ability.ability_dark_step_1.name: Dark Step LV.2
ability.ability_dark_step_2.name: Dark Step LV.3
ability.ability_dark_step_3.name: Dark Step MAX
ability.ability_dark_step.desc: Engulf yourself in Darkness and dash with the Action Button while sprinting!
ability.ability_light_within.name: Light Within
ability.ability_light_within.desc: Empowers you with the power of Light! Equip Light Boost to increase the effect.
ability.ability_darkness_within.name: Darkness Within
ability.ability_darkness_within.desc: Empowers you with the power of Darkness! Equip Darkness Boost to increase the effect.
ability.ability_dedication.name: Dedication
ability.ability_dedication.desc: Gain bonus stats, scaling with your level, depending on what path you chose.
ability.ability_hp_walker.name: HP Walker
ability.ability_mp_walker.name: MP Walker
ability.ability_exp_walker.name: EXP Walker
ability.ability_focus_walker.name: Focus Walker
ability.ability_heart_walker.name: Heart Walker
ability.ability_hp_walker.desc: Recover HP as you run. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_mp_walker.desc: Recover MP as you run. MP recharging speed remains unchanged. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_exp_walker.desc: Gain EXP as you run. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_focus_walker.desc: Recover Focus as you run. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_heart_walker.desc: Gain Hearts as you run. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_mp_shield.name: Mana Shield
ability.ability_mp_shield.desc: When you take damage, you will lose MP instead unless you're in MP Recharge.
ability.ability_vehemence.name: Vehemence
ability.ability_vehemence.desc: A sacrifice is made in exchange for more power. The effect differs depending on your chosen path.
ability.ability_mp_boost.name: MP Boost
ability.ability_mp_boost.desc: Increases your Max MP. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_hp_boost.name: HP Boost
ability.ability_hp_boost.desc: Increases your Max HP. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_riskcharge.name: Riskcharge
ability.ability_riskcharge.desc: Unleashes fighting spirit by pressing your Reaction Command button, consuming HP in the process. This empowers your strength.
ability.ability_attack_haste.name: Attack Haste
ability.ability_attack_haste.desc: Increases attack speed. Equip more to increase the effect.
ability.ability_hearts_power.name: Hearts Are Power
ability.ability_hearts_power.desc: ORGANIZATION XIII ONLY! The fleeting hearts you've collected are granting you power. This effect scales with Hearts obtained.
ability.ability_friends_power.name: Friends Are Power
ability.ability_friends_power.desc: Gain a bonus scaling with the amount of party members you have.
ability.ability_renewal_block.name: Renewal Block
ability.ability_renewal_block.desc: Upon a successful guard, restore a small amount of HP. Requires EFM Guard Skill.
ability.ability_focus_block.name: Focus Block
ability.ability_focus_block.desc: Upon a successful guard, restore a small amount of Focus. Requires EFM Guard Skill.
ability.ability_counter_hammer.name: Counter Hammer
ability.ability_counter_hammer.desc: Upon a successful guard, counter attack with a shockwave! Damage and Radius scales with Critical Boost!
ability.ability_counter_blast.name: Counter Blast
ability.ability_counter_blast.desc: Upon a successful guard, counter attack with a burst! Scales with Max MP!
ability.ability_counter_rush.name: Counter Rush
ability.ability_counter_rush.desc: Upon a successful guard, counter attack with a flurry of blows! Scales with Attack Haste!
ability.ability_tidus.name: Zanarkand's Ace
ability.ability_tidus.desc: The Spirit of Tidus bursts forth! Gain strength and speed when underwater, additionally you cannot drown!
ability.ability_jecht.name: Brutal Blitzer
ability.ability_jecht.desc: Unleash Jecht's fury! Your strikes deal extra damage according to the number of Critical Boosts equipped!

form.form_dark.name: Dark

form.form_twilight.name: Twilight
menu_button.prestigeConfirm.desc: Resets your level and choice. WARNING!!! You cannot undo this!!!
menu_button.prestige.desc: Allows you to reset your level if you meet the requirements.
menu_button.dreamEater.desc: A WIP MENU! Will crash you!
menu_button.panel.desc: ORGANIZATION XIII ONLY! Boost your stats further at the cost of Hearts!
menu_button.wiki.desc: {WIP} A Section that informs you about what Re:Mind has to offer!
